actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Labor Department.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Kennedy without amendment. With written report No. 100-551. Additional views filed.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 998.

official_title: A bill to establish a trust fund using civil penalties collected under the Occupational Health and Safety Act of 1970 to compensate victims of the collapse of the L'Ambiance Plaza in Bridgeport, Connecticut.

summary.text: Establishes a trust fund using civil penalties collected under the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to compensate victims of the collapse of the L'Ambiance Plaza in Bridgeport, Connecticut.

titles.title: A bill to establish a trust fund using civil penalties collected under the Occupational Health and Safety Act of 1970 to compensate victims of the collapse of the L'Ambiance Plaza in Bridgeport, Connecticut.
